# Shaun McRae

I am an Associate Professor of Economics at the [Centro de Investigación Económica](http://cie.itam.mx/en) and the [Department of Economics](https://economia.itam.mx/) at [ITAM](https://www.itam.mx/en) in Mexico City. I will be on sabbatical in the 2024-25 academic year and visiting the [Energy Centre](https://www.energycentre.auckland.ac.nz) and [Department of Economics](https://www.auckland.ac.nz/en/business/about-business-school/economics.html) at the University of Auckland in the first half of 2026.


### Research fields

- Energy Economics
- Environmental Economics
- Industrial Organization
